16 typedef enum {
17  FlurryLogLevelNone = 0, //No output
18  FlurryLogLevelCriticalOnly, //Default, outputs only critical log events
19  FlurryLogLevelDebug, //Debug level, outputs critical and main log events
20  FlurryLogLevelAll //Highest level, outputs all log events
21 } FlurryLogLevel;
22 
23 typedef enum {
24  FlurryEventFailed = 0,
25  FlurryEventRecorded,
26  FlurryEventUniqueCountExceeded,
27  FlurryEventParamsCountExceeded,
28  FlurryEventLogCountExceeded,
29  FlurryEventLoggingDelayed
30 } FlurryEventRecordStatus;
